mapper.sql: contacts_bind_id AS "contactsBindId", customer_id AS "customerId", contacts_id AS "contactsId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_crm_contacts_bind where 1 = 1
and contacts_bind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contactsBindId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and contacts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contactsId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
